fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Interface Service

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Attributable, Identifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractService

    public interface Service
extends Attributable, Identifiable
    Represents a functionality of a resource. Service identifier is not unique ; it represents a service specification identifier.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Device getDevice()
      Returns device which provides this service.
      Operation getOperation(String name, Class... parameterTypes)
      Returns operation provided by this service with specfied name and signature.
      List<Operation> getOperations()
      Returns a set containing all operations.
      String getTypeId()
      Returns the service type identifier.
